entities.name: rita skeeter
entities.description: Rita Skeeter is a journalist who is interviewing Harry. She asks him questions about his past and how it may have affected him.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the student being interviewed by Rita Skeeter. He seems to be feeling irritated by her questions.

entities.name: triwizard tournament
entities.description: The Triwizard Tournament is a competition that Harry has entered, despite initially denying it.

relationships.description: Rita Skeeter is interviewing Harry about his past and how it may have affected him.

Harry is a participant in the Triwizard Tournament, despite initially denying it.
